p.i: This section of the ReadMe covers some common questions asked by players.

body.p: This is covered in the interface part of the readme. Check here.

li.b: Why do some players become transparent and salute?

body.p: This is because of lag. The server has not had a response from this player for too long and so they have temporarally been turned into a "ghost" that cannot be shot (but don't worry, they can't shoot you either).

li.b: Someones name on the scoreboard is coloured red... why is this?

body.p: This is because they are the administrator. This means they know the password to the server, probably because they own the server, or are a friend of the person who owns the server, and because of this, they can do what they like on THEIR SERVER. Administrators overide all normal player votes.
